BackstoryDef.title: Underachiever
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born in an utterly generic city on an utterly generic midworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was constantly reminded by [PAWN_possessive] father that [PAWN_pronoun] "wasn't living up to [PAWN_possessive] potential." But [PAWN_pronoun] didn't care. [PAWN_pronoun] was happy screwing around, playing games, and studying only whatever caught [PAWN_possessive] interest, and then only for as long as it remained interesting.

BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by [PAWN_possessive] mother and "about 40 hands" on a ranch on a frontier planet. Though [PAWN_pronoun]'s generally more practical than intellectual, [PAWN_pronoun]'s not uneducated, and has at least a passing familiarity with literature.

BackstoryDef.title: Sky seeker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on a planet whose atmosphere was so polluted that no stars were visible, [PAWN_nameDef] always dreamed of someday seeing the sky beyond [PAWN_possessive] home.

BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] formative years on a glitterworld, where [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] friends pursued lives of idle pleasure. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew up, though, [PAWN_pronoun] began to find the life of ease unfulfilling, and decided to look for a more challenging path.

BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a glitterworld in a family of doctors. [PAWN_pronoun] chose to maintain the tradition, enrolling in med school. [PAWN_pronoun] had few friends, but got along with [PAWN_possessive] siblings very well.

BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was recognized as gifted early in [PAWN_possessive] glitterworld upbringing. Luckily, [PAWN_possessive] family was in a position to cultivate that genius through advanced education. [PAWN_possessive] training included science, leadership, and the arts.

BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up homeless on an urbworld. [PAWN_possessive] life was a constant struggle for survival on the streets, and made [PAWN_objective] hard and ruthless long before adulthood.

BackstoryDef.title: Optimistic child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was blessed with loving parents and a pleasant midworld life. [PAWN_pronoun] was an optimistic and sociable kid who loved making friends and listening to their stories. [PAWN_possessive] imagination would run wild with ideas and questions.

BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Orphaned and abandoned on the tumultuous streets of [PAWN_possessive] polluted, teeming homeworld, [PAWN_nameDef] survived by deft hand and fleet foot. A natural born thief and trickster, [PAWN_pronoun] was soon running [PAWN_possessive] own gang of urchins.

BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld army brat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on an urbworld military base. [PAWN_pronoun] was too young to fight, but [PAWN_pronoun] learned to make [PAWN_objective]self useful in other ways. [PAWN_pronoun] became familiar with guns and military equipment, but never really got in touch with the natural world.
